posts.post_content:
I am interested in buying a starter lot (100+) of PSA/SGC graded T206s to begin an assault on the monster! :eek: The set will be low to mid grade (probably no higher than ex) with emphasis on front color and centering.  Slight back damage is okey-dokey.  If anyone has a lot to sell, please contact me at [url]jwondowski@aol.com[/url].  

Thank you.

John Wondowski
